replies.bodyText:
The code would need to be the following, which is equivalent to what is already being used.
!(assert... && assert...)
To be more pedantic on validation I could explicitly check each of these for being true and asserting the count of trues to be one. Another option is having these return 0 for failure and 1 for success and adding and checking it equals 1.
